description:
In this course I walk you through the exact steps I used to get over 50 radio and podcast appearances in one year, in which I promoted my own show and my products.

I walk you through every step of my strategy, literally from showing you how to sign up for RadioGuestList to pitch radio and podcast hosts, to generating the maximum amount of traffic once you are already on the show.

WHY THIS COURSE WILL BE AMAZING FOR YOUR BUSINESS

  • Every podcast appearance will come with a blog post and a link to your website, which helps your SEO
  • You will get actual clients from the listeners of these shows
  • You will grow your brand and establish yourself as a celebrity in your niche
  • You will drive traffic to your website and products

SIGN UP FOR THE COURSE AND START GETTING AMAZING PUBLICITY AND SEO

Sign up for the course now, and start getting publicity for your business as early as tomorrow with these very proven and effective strategies that I personally have been using to grow my business in an amazing way, for free. I didn't have to hire anyone or pay anyone to get so much publicity.
title: How I got 50+ podcast appearances using RadioGuestList
